sentences.en: Chris Kelly (guitar) and Benny Hayes (keyboards and vocals)
sentences.cn: 克里斯·凯利(吉他手)和本尼·海斯(键盘手和主唱)

sentences.en: However, most enterprise and productivity software lends itself pretty well to keyboard commands.
sentences.cn: 不过, 目前多数商业和生产性的软件也都有很好的键盘命令.

sentences.en: I bought a keyboard in the supermarket yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我在超市上买了个键盘.

sentences.en: I was expected to familiarise myself with the keyboard.
sentences.cn: 对我的要求是熟悉键盘。

sentences.en: It has a stylus-operated on-screen keyboard that takes great skill to master.
sentences.cn: 它有触笔屏幕键盘，需要使用者掌握很高的技巧。

sentences.en: Not everyone enjoys writing the software required for keyboard encoding.
sentences.cn: 并不是人人都喜欢编写键盘所需的软件.

sentences.en: Our software tools are mostly silent; all we hear is the quiet click of the keyboard.
sentences.cn: 我们的软件工具通常是沉默的, 我们能听到的只有静静敲击键盘的声音.

sentences.en: She reached out her hands to the keyboard and began to play.
sentences.cn: 她将手伸向键盘并开始演奏.

sentences.en: Tanya's hands rippled over the keyboard.
sentences.cn: 塔尼娅的双手在琴键上翻飞。

sentences.en: The keyboard is a large and clumsy instrument as far as portable computers are concerned.
sentences.cn: 就手提电脑而言，键盘就显得大而笨重了。

sentences.en: The keyboard is used for data entry, but not typically for command entry or navigation.
sentences.cn: 键盘用于数据输入, 而不是特有的命令输入或导航工具.

sentences.en: The keyboard sends a message to the bank's computer.
sentences.cn: 键盘把信息传送到银行的计算机里.

sentences.en: To close your document, press CTRL+W on your keyboard.
sentences.cn: 关闭文件时要同时按键盘上的CTRL键和W键。
未经键盘操作技能训练的

sentences.en: We call up the arrow on the screen with the keyboard.
sentences.cn: 我们通过键盘把箭头调出到显示屏.

words.tran_cn: 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索
键入；用键盘式排字机排字

phrases.tran_cn: 电脑操作员；键盘操作员

trans.tran_en: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine
to put information into a computer, using a keyboard
